name: Frog Ninja (RudeAlienStudios)
description:
Frog Ninja is a little game made for Kex x Pusia Mini Jam

There are 4 types of obstacles in this game
Bad Frog - blue Frog with black shoes
Spy Frog - blue Frog painted green with black shoes to trick player into thinking he's the good Frog
Buddy Frog - Your buddy, he is green and has red shoes, don't kill him tho (he is your buddy)
Spikes - undefeatable spikes, there is no way of defeating them so just have to jump over them

How to play:
Space - Jump/Attack

You attack by holding space while Ninja Frog is touching enemy Frog
